project_title.text: Mobile Communications App: Community Sponsored Team Project

project_preview_description.text: A mobile communications app that displays announcements and comments made for a non-profit organization.

project_description.text: We were tasked with making a messaging and communications app to display announcements and comments. My role in this project was mainly to design the front end for all the pages, however I also work on some functionality in the back end. For this school project, our team competed with other teams for a chance to get selected. Our project ended up being chosen by the non-profit organization.
We made this app using Flutter, a recent technology for making mobile apps. The reason we chose Flutter is because we wanted to try learning a new technology for making this project.
